info.name: 4-Letter Words
info.attribution:
Layout, design, and library image by LawDawg96. Released to the Public Domain under CC0.

Wood grain background by RyanPro available under the Pixabay license from https://pixabay.com/photos/trees-wood-yellow-wood-oak-1915247/

Word list available at https://www.wordsdetail.com/4-letter-words/.
info.description: Be the first to get rid of all of your letter cards in this fast-paced game. Play is simultaneous, so think fast. How many 4 letter words do you know?
info.ruleText:
The object is to be the first player to get rid of all of your cards. In the event that no valid plays are left, the player with the fewest cards wins.
Players begin at the same time and make plays at the same time. Move a letter from your hand up to the play area on the board. Cards are double sided with one letter on each side. The small letters in the upper left corner represent the two letters on the card with the top letter being the current face-up letter.

When playing a card, there are only two rules. First, the letter must be different than the letter being played on. Second, the four letters in the play area must always spell a valid four-letter word.

A wild card (blank) can represent any letter, but it still must be different than the letter it is being played on top of.

The only penalty for playing an invalid letter or word is that the card is returned to your hand.
info.helpText:
Players sit in seats.  Press the reset button in the upper right to begin.

You can choose your own starting word by typing it in, or let the computer select a random word. You can also display (or hide) a log of valid words played. The checkmark next to the reset button means that every play is being checked against a list of all valid 4-letter English words. Click the check mark to turn this on or off at any time during the game.

During play, click on a card to flip it over. Drag and drop cards onto the holder to make a play.  Simultaneous play on VirtualTabletop.io can sometimes glitch.

When a wildcard is played, all play must stop. If a card is being dragged, stop dragging it. The player that played the wildcard will see a button. Press that button and choose which letter the wildcard represents. If the play is valid, then the wildcard will display the chosen letter and play resumes.

fields.text: This will completely reset the board and start a new game. Are you sure?

fields.label: Check the box to randomly select a starting word from a list of all 4-letter English words. Uncheck the box to type your own word.
